title: Team Recruitment/Future Clash/ Flex 5v5s
body:
{LFM}  

Hey Guys,

With the likely return of clash coming in the new season. I am looking to create a team to get more competitive with in the lead up to the tournaments. Ideally we would scrim/practice on the weekend with obvious exceptions with the coming holiday season. At this stage recruiting anyone of any rank who has voicecomms and is keen to participate in a competitive yet chill team environment.\


Add me: Bombasticbaboon

I'll set up some games this weekend for those interested!

Great Chance to explore team comps, picks and bans, Strategy and review, without the pressures of playing with a team for the first time in the clash tournaments!
